long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with the ultimate all-in-one tool for efficient navigation. "Browsing Tools" revolutionizes the way you browse the web, search, and access your favorite Google apps.

"Browsing Tools" updates your new tab page settings while you browse online. 

Streamline your online activities with a unified browsing hub:
Smart Tab Search bar: Instantly search the web or specific websites directly from the Tab Search bar.  
Effortless Google App Access: Seamlessly reach your favorite Google apps – Gmail, Calendar, Drive, and more – from one central location. No more digging through bookmarks or tabs.

How Does it work?
Add the extension to Chrome
Click on “Keep It” when you first start using the extension.
Streamline your online activities with a unified browsing hub.


With the power of "Browsing Tools," you can instantly search, access Google apps, and launch shortcuts- all from a single, convenient location. Say goodbye to tab clutter and hello to a cleaner, faster, and more organized browsing journey.

By using "Browsing Tools", you agree to our TOU and Privacy Policy.
